short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Podcast Search, 播客搜索，podcast player, 播放器，播客学英语, 播客搜索插件

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introduction
This Chrome extension allows users to search for podcasts, view details, and play episodes directly in the browser. It supports both English and Chinese languages.

Features
Search for podcasts using keywords
View podcast details including description and episode list
Play podcast episodes directly in the browser
Toggle episode descriptions
Responsive design for various screen sizes
Bilingual support (English and Chinese)
